title: 3.841 LEGISLATIVE COORDINATING COMMISSION.
text: For purposes of sections 3.842 and 3.843, "commission" means the Legislative Coordinating Commission or a legislative commission or subcommittee established by the coordinating commission under section 3.305, subdivision 6, to exercise the powers and discharge the duties of the coordinating commission under sections 3.842 and 3.843 or other law requiring action by the coordinating commission on matters relating to administrative rules.
